Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Skokie. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
